tasks.label: Clean and Build drivers_cpp.elf
tasks.command: Remove-Item ./build -Recurse -ErrorAction Ignore; cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_TESTS=OFF; cmake --build build

tasks.label: Clean and Build Unit Tests
tasks.command: Remove-Item ./build -Recurse -ErrorAction Ignore; cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_TESTS=ON; cmake --build build

tasks.label: Clean/Build drivers.elf and Flash to Target
tasks.command: Remove-Item ./build -Recurse -ErrorAction Ignore; cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_TESTS=OFF; cmake --build build; arm-none-eabi-gdb -x scripts/flash_gdb --batch
